docs.lead_paragraph: Most of the governors at their annual conference did not find the keynote speech of John W. Gardner to their liking. The former Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare, who now heads the Urban Coalition, cut through the sham surrounding the problems of the cities and pointed to some painful truths.
